dashboard.syncConfirm: Run Git sync? This may take a while.
dashboard.lastRunsTooltip: Shows status of recent runs (green=success, red=failed, yellow=running)
dashboard.pipelineActiveTooltip: Active: pipeline can run | Inactive: pipeline is disabled

auth.providerUnavailable: This login provider is not configured. Please contact the administrator.
auth.subtitle: Pipeline Orchestrator

errors.generic: An error occurred. The application has been notified.

settings.title: Settings
settings.envOnly: Settings are currently loaded from environment variables only.
settings.envHint: To change settings permanently, edit the .env file or set the corresponding environment variables.
settings.concurrentRunsTooltip: How many pipelines can run at the same time
settings.linkAccountsHint: Link accounts to sign in with multiple providers. Email may differ per provider; linking works via "Connect now".
settings.executorK8s: Active: Kubernetes (Jobs) – Pipeline runs execute as K8s jobs.
settings.executorDocker: Active: Docker (socket proxy) – Pipeline runs execute as Docker containers.
settings.telemetryInfo: Phase 1: Error reporting. Phase 2: Usage statistics (Product Analytics). Session recording (replay) is not used.
settings.telemetryToggle: Usage statistics (Product Analytics, anonymous). No session recording.
settings.noSessionRecording: Session recording (screen replay) is not used.
settings.dependencyAuditInfo: Daily (pip-audit) all pipelines with requirements.txt are checked for known vulnerabilities (CVE). On finding: email and/or Teams (as configured under Notifications).
settings.cronInfo: Cron with 5 fields: minute hour day month weekday. Default: 0 3 * * * (daily at 3:00).
settings.dependencyNotifyNote: On vulnerabilities found, email and/or Microsoft Teams (as configured under Notifications) will be notified.
settings.devHint: Visible when .env has ENVIRONMENT=development. Sends test exceptions to PostHog. Choose: Backend or Frontend.
settings.posthogFrontendSuccess: Test exception sent to PostHog (frontend). Check in PostHog.
settings.maxRunsInfo: Maximum number of runs to keep per pipeline. Older ones are deleted.
settings.maxAgeInfo: Runs older than X days are deleted automatically
settings.maxLogSizeInfo: Log files larger than X MB are truncated or deleted
settings.containerTimeoutInfo: Maximum container runtime in seconds. None = unlimited.
settings.retryAttemptsInfo: Number of automatic retries on failure
settings.lastBackupInfo: Time of last successful log upload to S3/MinIO (reset on restart).
settings.forceFlushTooltip: Runs immediate cleanup: deletes old logs per retention rules, cleans orphan Docker containers. Cannot be undone.
settings.forceFlushModalTitle: Force flush (cleanup) – what will be flushed?
settings.cleanupLogDesc: Cleans log files, metrics files, and database entries
settings.cleanupDockerDesc: Cleans orphan Docker containers and volumes
settings.cleanupWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone. All deleted data will be lost permanently.
settings.cleanupDeleteOldest: Deletes oldest runs per pipeline (keeps max {{count}} runs per pipeline)
settings.cleanupTruncateLogs: Truncates or deletes log files larger than {{mb}} MB
settings.cleanupOrphanContainers: Deletes orphan containers with label 'fastflow-run-id' (no matching DB entry)
settings.recipientsHint: Comma-separated list of email addresses for notifications
settings.notificationApiHint: Allow scripts/CI to send email and Teams notifications via API key. Enable below, set rate limit, and create keys.
settings.notificationApiKeysEmpty: No keys yet. Create a key to use in scripts (header: X-Notification-Key).
settings.keyGeneratedOnce: This key is only shown once. Copy and store it securely.
settings.notificationApiKeyCreated: Key created. Copy it now; it will not be shown again.
settings.envVarRestart: Environment variables. An application restart is required.
settings.smtpPasswordTitle: SMTP password must be set via SMTP_PASSWORD environment variable

sync.clearConfirm: Delete all pipelines in the directory (including .git)? You can then clone a new repository via Sync. This action cannot be undone.
sync.clearSuccess: Pipelines directory cleared. You can now sync a new repo.
sync.cachedPipelinesTooltip: These pipelines were pre-heated during sync for faster execution
sync.saveSettingsNote: Note: Settings are saved only for the current instance.
sync.pipelinesSubdirTooltip: If your pipelines are in a subfolder in the repo (e.g. pipelines/), enter the folder name here. Empty = repo root.
sync.clearPipelinesNote: If pipelines (e.g. examples) already exist in the directory, it must be cleared first before a new repository can be cloned.
sync.stepBranch: Enter branch and optionally pipelines subdirectory, then Save and "Test configuration".
sync.deployKeyGenerated: Deploy key generated. Add the public key in GitHub (Deploy keys).
sync.urlMustStart: URL must start with https://, http://, git@ or ssh://
sync.enterSshUrl: Please enter the SSH repository URL first
sync.deployKeyOnlySsh: Deploy key can only be generated for SSH URLs (git@... or ssh://...)
sync.minIntervalError: Auto-sync interval must be at least 60 seconds

dependencies.intro: Libraries and versions of all pipelines with requirements.txt.
dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.scanPromptOrResults: Click "Run security scan" to start a new CVE scan, or view the last saved results below.
dependencies.lastScanError: Could not load last scan results.

pipelineDetail.lastCacheWarmupTooltip: Time of last pre-heating. Pipelines with cache start faster.
pipelineDetail.downstreamTooltip: When this pipeline finishes, other pipelines can be started automatically. Configurable in pipeline.json or via UI.
pipelineDetail.timeoutInfo: Maximum runtime in seconds. Pipeline is terminated if exceeded.
pipelineDetail.retryAttemptsInfo: Number of retry attempts on failure
pipelineDetail.maxInstancesInfo: Maximum number of concurrent runs for this pipeline
pipelineDetail.resetStatsTooltip: Resets all statistics for this pipeline. Runs and data are preserved.
pipelineDetail.webhooksDisabled: Webhooks are disabled for this pipeline.
pipelineDetail.webhooksEnableHint: To enable webhooks, add webhook_key to pipeline.json (or per entry in schedules[]) in the repository.
pipelineDetail.webhookStandardInfo: Triggers a run with the default configuration (no schedule-specific env/limits)
pipelineDetail.webhookRunConfigInfo: Triggers a run with run config "{{id}}" (env/limits from schedules[]).
pipelineDetail.noDownstreamTriggered: No downstream triggers configured. When this pipeline finishes, no other pipeline is started automatically.

scheduler.title: Scheduler
scheduler.editError: GitHub link for pipeline.json not available (no GitHub repo configured)

setupWizard.title: Initial settings
setupWizard.text: Error reporting and usage statistics help us improve Fast-Flow. Everything runs anonymously and securely in the EU. Session recording is not used.
setupWizard.note: This helps our developers a lot – thank you. All anonymous and secure. Session recording (screen recording) is not used.

secrets.intro: Secrets come from the database or from pipeline.json (encrypted_env / default_env). Below you see both: DB entries and keys used in pipelines.
secrets.envKeysFromPipelines: Env keys from encrypted_env and default_env of all pipelines (values are not shown here).
secrets.title: Secrets & parameters
secrets.encryptHint: Enter plaintext, encrypt, and add the ciphertext to pipeline.json under encrypted_env.
secrets.encryptSuccess: Value encrypted. Add to pipeline.json under encrypted_env.
secrets.encryptResultHint: Add to pipeline.json under encrypted_env, e.g.: "KEY": "<ciphertext here>"
secrets.noEntriesPipeline: No env keys found in pipeline.json
secrets.showHideTooltip: Click to show or hide value

invite.title: Join request
invite.invalidLinkDesc: The invitation link is incomplete or invalid.
invite.invitedTitle: You have been invited to Fast-Flow!
invite.invitedDesc: Sign in with GitHub or Google to accept the invitation. The email must match the invitation.

requestSent.title: Request sent
requestSent.body: Your join request has been created. An administrator will review it.
requestSent.note: You may receive an email once you have been approved. Until then, you cannot access the app here.
requestSent.loginLink: If you have already been approved, you can sign in here

accountBlocked.title: Account blocked
accountBlocked.body: Your account has been blocked. Please contact an administrator.
